info.name: Beatport Dark Theme
info.description: Change the colours of the new Beatport HTML5 site to light text on a dark background, a bit more like the old Flash site used to be (though I've not attempted to copy that), for those of us who prefer darkness...
info.additionalInfo:
Version 1.3 (2012/12/03)
* Fixed "filter list" visibility

Version 1.2 (2012/02/09)
* Fixed "My Account" legibility

Version 1.1 (2012/02/08)
* Fixed some legibility problems on the shopping cart / checkout page, especially the Totals block, and the Beatbot recommendations.
* Odd/even alternating row colours in tables (those that have the right classes, anyway).
* A few other minor tweaks to improve the look.
 
Version 1.0
Please report any issues/fixes to quextal at quextal dot c o m
